name: PreludeSys
description: We work with young and mature enterprises in a diverse set of verticals. As a trusted technology partner, we go the extra mile in helping our clients leverage technology and outsourcing using our technical expertise and industry experience. Our focus is on enhancing the business value through digital transformation by applying cloud, mobile, and AI-related technologies.
Headline: Real potential, Realised
ShortDescription: PreludeSys is an IT services company that specializes in Digital Transformation through Microsoft Azure

Highlights.name: Global Technology Solutions Provider:
Highlights.description: PreludeSys is a global technology solutions provider founded in 1998. They offer a variety of services including Enterprise Application Integration, Application Modernization and Cloud Migration, Business Intelligence and Data Analytics, Business Application Services

Highlights.name: Award-Winning Workplace
Highlights.description: PreludeSys has been certified as a 'Great Place to Work' in 2021, 2022, and 2023.

Highlights.name: Diverse Clientele
Highlights.description: PreludeSys works with both young and mature enterprises across the globe in a diverse set of verticals.

enhanced_description: PreludeSys is a global IT services and technology solutions provider founded in 1999, specializing in Digital Transformation through Microsoft Azure. They partner with young and mature enterprises across diverse verticals to enhance business value by leveraging technical expertise and industry experience. Their services include Enterprise Application Integration, Application Modernization, Cloud Migration, Business Intelligence and Data Analytics, and Business Application Services, applying cloud, mobile, and AI-related technologies, with a focus on privacy regulation compliance and delivering higher ROI.
competitive_advantages: Deep technical expertise and industry experience
Specialization in Microsoft Azure for Digital Transformation
Global reach as a technology solutions provider
Focus on achieving higher ROI for clients
